sqlMap.select: select a.*, (select goods_name from goods where goods_no = a.goods_no) as goods_name, (select main_img_save from goods where goods_no = a.goods_no) as main_img_save, (select goods_color from goods where goods_no = a.goods_no) as goods_color, (select category_no from goods where goods_no = a.goods_no) as category_no, goods_qty as order_qty, goods_price as order_price from basket a where no = #no# and status = 'y' order by no desc
select a.*, (select main_img_save from goods where goods_no = a.goods_no) as main_img_save from orders a where id = #id# and status = 'y' and basket_status = 'y' order by no desc

select a.*, (select goods_name from goods where goods_no = a.goods_no) as goods_name, (select main_img_save from goods where goods_no = a.goods_no) as main_img_save from basket a where id = #id# and status = 'y' order by no desc
select sum(order_price) as order_price_sum from orders where id = #id# and status = 'y' and basket_status = 'y'
select sum(goods_price) as goods_price_sum from basket where id = #id# and status = 'y'
select goods_price from goods where goods_no = #goods_no# and status = 'y'
select goods_price from basket where no = #no# and status = 'y'
select max(order_key) as no from order_no
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO orders(no, order_no, category_no, goods_no, goods_name, goods_color, order_qty, order_price, id, settle_type, order_status, status, basket_status, datetime) VALUES (orders_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #order_no#, #category_no#, #goods_no#, #goods_name#, #goods_color#, #order_qty#, #order_price#, #id#, '', #order_status#, 'y', 'y', #datetime#)
INSERT INTO basket(no, goods_no, goods_qty, goods_price, status, id) VALUES (basket_no_seq.NEXTVAL, #goods_no#, #goods_qty#, #goods_price#, 'y', #id#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE orders SET status = 'y', basket_status = 'n', mem_name = #mem_name#, zip_code = #zip_code#, address1 = #address1#, address2 = #address2#, phone = #phone#, settle_type = #settle_type#, order_memo = #order_memo#, order_status = #order_status# WHERE order_no = #order_no#
UPDATE orders SET status = 'n' WHERE no = #no#
UPDATE basket SET goods_qty = #goods_qty#, goods_price = #goods_price# WHERE no = #no#
UPDATE orders SET basket_status = 'n' WHERE id = #id#
